description: There is no dealing with the force_host/force_node options in the ChanceScheduler, which means that  the  force_host/force_node options doesn't work.
title: ChanceScheduler: there is no dealing with the force_host/force_node options

comments.content: There is no dealing with the force_host/force_node options in the ChanceScheduler, which means that  the  force_host/force_node options doesn't work.

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/171951
Reason: This patch has been idle for a long time, so I am abandoning it to keep the review clean sane. If you're interested in still working on this patch, then please unabandon it and upload a new patchset.
